```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
datensatz <- readRDS("robo_pflege.rds")

```

## Histogramme
```{r warning= F}
datensatz %>% ggplot() +  aes(x = robo_wash) + geom_histogram(bins = 30, fill="red")
datensatz %>% ggplot() +  aes(x = human_wash) + geom_histogram(bins = 30, fill="blue")
```
